Class QuickSearchField


  • public class QuickSearchField

    QuickSearchField.bbj

    See Also:
    []

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuickSearchField(BBjInputE control!, BusinessComponent bc!)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and TypeMethod and Description
      BBjInputEgetControl()
      StringgetDescForID(String id!)

      returns the description for an id, used to correctly display the text in the input without using quicksearch, for example when the input is filled with the id after selection change in the binder.

      BooleanisControlFocused(BBjControl control!)
      voidonEditModifyEvent(BBjEvent ev!)

      in the input control on edit modify: after 1 second has passed without input, start the search. also resets the userdata and sends dirty signal to the binder, if binder is set, because this eventhandler overwrites the old one defined in SimpleFormComponent

      voidonKeyPressed(BBjInputKeypressEvent ev!)

      in the input control, when arrow up or arrow down is pressed, then the popup control should be focused, so the user can navigate the search hits

      voidopenList(BBjEvent ev!)

      expands the list of the popup control with the search hits. has to be in a timer with a delay, otherwise it will not work. called by the startSearch() method.

      voidparseAttributes()

      parses the id fields and determines if the field has a desc field by looking it up in the attributes record of the lookup bc

      voidpopupSelect(BBjListSelectEvent ev!)
      voidpopupSelect(BBjNumber index)

      on selection of an item in the popup screen, the userdata of the input control is set to the selected id and the text is set to the description

      voidsearchButtonClick(BBjEvent ev!)
      voidsetBinder(BCBinder binder!)
      voidsetSearchFieldName(String searchFieldName!)

      what the field to use for the fulltext search is. default is '_SEARCH'

      voidsetUseWildCard(Boolean useWildCard!)

      wether to use asterisks * before and after the search string. default is true

      voidstartSearch(BBjEvent ev!)

      starts the search in the bc using the search field name (default is '_SEARCH') and filling the popup control with the resultset for up to #maxEntries (default 10) items. also generates description and assembles id

      voidterminateSearchUI()
